title: PolyVideo - Retrospective Analysis on changes in markets during live showings
description: A tool that allows users to view youtube videos and market odds side by side; see exactly when the probability of the supreme court striking down Trump's policy spiked during a hearing liverstream

title: PolyCorr - Find and test correlations between equities and markets
description: A tool to specify a market and timeframe, have LLMs identify equities that should be closely directly and inversely correlated, and then test those relationships.
